text: Chard is a leaf vegetable. Chard may also refer to: * Chardonnay or Chard, a grape variety or a varietal wine made from the Chardonnay grape * Chard (name) * Chard, Alberta an alternative name for a hamlet of Janvier South, in Canada * Chard, Creuse, a commune of Creuse, France * Chard, Somerset, a town in England ** Chard RFC, an English rugby union team
title: Chard (disambiguation)
